idea:
“Expenses over income” is the main problem faced by the society due to which people always disregard the part of savings and investment. Hence, to tackle with this problem we have innovated a service, where we help the public to save when they spend. We are developing a platform which encourages the common man to save money and have their own investments in numerous ways. We are developing a micro investing platform. Every time a user spends by swiping a card or spending in cash our app/website will set aside some money and invest the amount into a diversified portfolio recommended specifically for that user. There are more unique ways of investing which are as follows: 
a)	Whenever your favourite team plays a match, you can invest a small portion of your income into savings;
b)	When you walk 10,000 steps per day, sum of money from your income will be deducted and used for savings.
These are few glimpses of innovation undertaken by the startup. Savings and spending patterns of customers will now go hand in hand and people will start saving by spending more. We are trying to innovate the way in which people think and manage their investments. We are trying to establish a message that anyone can invest.
name: MIRAYA WEALTH ADVISORS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Manufacturing in India has largely remained unorganized and accessible only to large companies in limited cities only. It is difficult to access required information and resources, find manufacturers and know fair pricing. On the other hand, a large number of small and medium sized manufacturers have idle unutilized capacity on their machines.
Our aim is to democratize hardware development and make manufacturing accessible to businesses, small or large, across geographies. Our platform is powered by a network of skilled vendors who offer prototyping, development and manufacturing skills. Utilizing data from this network we make unbiased, high quality, expert manufacturing advice available to the customers across the globe, in a quick and cost-efficient manner. 
Our team has worked with more than 30 businesses, developed 350+ products through our network of 28 suppliers across India. We are using technology to bring manufacturing online and bridge the unmet demand for low volume customized manufacturing with unutilized capacity at the manufacturers. This opens new possibilities for a number of small manufacturers to make products for the world, in India.
name: BENDABLE TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our interactive concept allows our users to challenge their friends for trivia quiz or predict some of the To-Be-Announced questions. This kind of concept has not arrived into the market yet, also it'll be India's First Social Network full of challenges and amazing offers like wallet balances of PAYTM, BookMyShow, Zomato, etc. We also ensure employment since initially we're aiming on a national release of the product, which will be very difficult without an amazing team of Indians!

name: FLYREEL PRODUCTIONS LLP

idea:
Public transportation is a type of the transportation process which
enables an individual to travel together. Local shared transportation is a type of the
public transportation which enables the individual to share a vehicle simultaneously,
which further share a cost of a journey. A local shared transport system includes a
plurality of transport options such as a bus, a train, a tram, shared cab or a metro. The
shared transport system plays an important role for the individual who is unable to
drive, an individual without access to personal vehicle, a child or an individual with
disabilities. Increase in numbers of the local shared transport options help in reducing
a plurality of private vehicles which also reduces traffic congestion. Various local
shared transport systems are available which helps the individual in travelling
conveniently across a region.
The system includes a booking
subsystem configured to enable a user to book one or more tickets of the local shared
transport based on one or more parameters. The booking subsystem is also configured
to generate a unique identification code for validation of one or more booked tickets
of the local shared transport. The system also includes a payment subsystem
operatively coupled to the booking subsystem. The payment subsystem is configured
to process a payment for the one or more booked tickets using at least one payment
method. The system also includes a tracking subsystem operatively coupled to the
booking subsystem. The tracking subsystem is configured to track a real-time location
of a booked local shared transport.
name: CNR TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
